name: Yin
description:
Yin and Yang have been separated. Yin will have to find Yang to restore balance, but as she moves, chaos follows behind.

Thank you to everybody who has been providing feedback! I have decided to continue working on and expanding Yin, hopefully into a fully fleshed out game. For those who want to follow along, I will be posting updates on YouTube and Twitter!

@SodaRocketDev

Be sure to check out my YouTube channel!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCu8vDVqulnal9q6SNwamyCA
